---
title: "Requirements"
---

To start this lab, you'll need:

:::{.callout-important}
Visit the "[Programming Toolkit-webpage](https://kirenz.github.io/lab-toolkit/)" to learn how to meet all requirements.
:::

- **Python**: Anaconda, Anaconda Environment `gradio` and Visual Studio Code
- **Environment**: A lab folder on your machine, an HuggingFace key and an environment file with your HuggingFace key
